29 #define MIXTURE_LOOP(__CODE__)\
30 std::string _names_[10] = {\
31  "air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T",\
32  "air5_RRHO_ChemNonEqTTv",\
33  "air5_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T",\
34  "air5_NASA-9_ChemNonEq1T",\
35  "air11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T",\
36  "air11_RRHO_ChemNonEqTTv",\
37  "air11_NASA-7_ChemNonEq1T",\
38  "air11_NASA-9_ChemNonEq1T",\
39  "argon_CR_ChemNonEq1T",\
40  "argon_CR_ChemNonEqTTv"\
41 };\
42 Mutation::GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(TEST_DATA_FOLDER);\
43 for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {\
44  SECTION(_names_[i]) {\
45  Mixture mix(_names_[i]);\
46  __CODE__ ;\
47  }\
48 }

56 #define MIXTURE_GSI_MASS_LOOP(__CODE__)\
57 std::string _names_[5] = {\
58  "smb_air5_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T",\
59  "smb_oxidation_NASA9_ChemNonEq1T",\
60  "smb_sublimation_NASA9_ChemNonEq1T",\
61  "smb_aircarbon11_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T",\
62  "smb_o2_RRHO_ChemNonEq1T"\
63 };\
64 Mutation::GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(TEST_DATA_FOLDER);\
65 for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {\
66  SECTION(_names_[i]) {\
67  Mixture mix(_names_[i]);\
68  __CODE__ ;\
69  }\
70 }

77 #define EQUILIBRATE_LOOP(__CODE__)\
78 for (int ip = 0.0; ip < 10; ++ip) {\
79  double P = std::exp(ip/9.0*std::log(100000.0)+std::log(10.0));\
80  for (int it = 0.0; it < 10; ++it) {\
81  double T = 1000.0*it + 1000.0;\
82  mix.equilibrate(T, P);\
83  __CODE__ ;\
84  }\
85 }
